mapper.select: select a.player_id,a.vote_id,player_name,phone,a.player_num,a.des,a.image,a.vote_num,a.update_time from wx_vote_player a where a.vote_id=#{voteId} and status='1' ORDER BY a.player_num

select a.player_id,a.vote_id,player_name,phone,a.player_num,a.des,a.image,a.vote_num,a.update_time from wx_vote_player a where a.vote_id=#{voteId} and status='1'
and ( a.player_num LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR A.player_name LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" )
ORDER BY a.player_num

select a.player_id,a.player_num,a.player_name,a.phone,a.des,a.image ,a.vote_num,a.vote_id,a.update_time ,b.account_id 'vote.account_id' ,b.rules 'vote.rules' ,b.start_time 'vote.start_time' ,b.end_time 'vote.end_time' ,b.vote_name 'vote.vote_name' ,b.template 'vote.template', b.login_url 'vote.login_url' from wx_vote_player a inner join wx_vote b on a.vote_id=b.vote_id where a.player_id=#{playerId}
